title: Global citizenship education simulation through service-learning partnership design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematics pedagogy and service-learning concepts
context.additional_context: Enhancing partnership design capabilities for pre-service teachers to foster global citizenship through community collaboration in mathematics education.

learning_goals: Learners can create mathematics-based service project proposals for solving community issues
A university-community partnership model can be designed using VR simulations
Three or more applicable partnership evaluation criteria can be derived for mathematics education settings

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
